definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Di4 er4 Yi1 ke1 Da4 xue2
Shang4 hai3 Yi1 ke1 Da4 xue2
Tong2 ji4 Yi1 ke1 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: This is the website of Oita Medical University.
sentences.chinese: 這是大分醫科大學的網站。

sentences.english: First Affiliated Hospital of Harbin Medical University, Department of Respiratory Medicine, deputy director of the Second Ward.
sentences.chinese: 哈爾濱醫科大學附屬第一醫院呼吸內科二病房副主任。

sentences.english: Dalian Medical University campus is located in the new South Waterfront Lushun the middle of tourist belt.
sentences.chinese: 大連醫科大學新校園位於旅順南路海濱觀光帶的中段。

sentences.english: Dr. Li graduated from the Shanghai Medical University with the highest honors.
sentences.chinese: 李先生以優異的成績從上海醫科大學畢業。

sentences.english: His mother is Austrian took the lead in studying medicine, one of the women.
sentences.chinese: 他的母親是奧國率先學習醫科的婦女之一。

sentences.english: Seth Gemme, a UB medical student, is corresponding author on the paper.
sentences.chinese: Buffalo大學醫科學生，是本文的協作者。

sentences.english: Dalian Medical University associate adjunct professor, senior medical skin beauty expert.
sentences.chinese: 大連醫科大學兼職副教授，資深皮膚醫學美容專家。

sentences.english: Luckily , in 2004 , i was admitted into peking union medicalcollege , majoring anesthesiology.
sentences.chinese: 2004年順利考取了中國協和醫科大學麻醉學專業。

sentences.english: The college also offers pre-education courses for more than 300 students who come from five medical universities.
sentences.chinese: 爲五個醫科大學培養本碩連讀預科學生300餘人。

sentences.english: Muhannad, his elder son, a twenty-one-year-old medical student, was fighting at the front.
sentences.chinese: 大兒子，21歲的醫科生穆罕納德，在前線參加戰鬥。

sentences.english: Public hospitals cannot recruit all medical students.
sentences.chinese: 公立醫院無法吸納所有醫科生。

sentences.english: I see many students taking pre-medical courses with joyless tenacity.
sentences.chinese: 我見過許多上醫科預備課程的學生趣味索然地苦撐。

sentences.english: After he was admitted to comply with the wishes of Beijing Union Medical College parents.
sentences.chinese: 後遵從父母意願考入北京協和醫科大學。

sentences.english: David was the son and he was going to medical school.
sentences.chinese: 大衛是那家人的兒子，即將入讀醫科學院。

sentences.english: Some medical schools issue students with smartphones.
sentences.chinese: 一些醫科學校也會給學生配發智能手機。

sentences.english: It's being taken to Tokyo's Jikei Medical University for a complete CT scan.
sentences.chinese: 它被送到東京一所醫科大學做了次全面的CT掃描。

definition: to change schools/to transfer to another college
abbr. for 臺灣大學|台湾大学[Tai2 wan1 Da4 xue2]
student of a senior high school
to practice medicine (esp. in private practice)
